title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 720.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 720.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part contains and describes the policies and procedures
governing the correspondence program available to all inmates. The exchange of
correspondence between an inmate and another person or business must be in
accord with the regulations contained in this Part. (For policies and
procedures governing privileged correspondence, see Part 721 of this

Title.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
720.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
